description: Buttery shortbread crust, tangy lemon filling, and a golden crumb topping—these bars are sweet, zesty, and impossible to resist!
ingredients: [{"name": "unsalted butter", "units": "cup", "amount": 1}, {"name": "all-purpose flour", "units": "cups", "amount": 2}, {"name": "granulated sugar", "units": "cup", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "salt", "units": "tsp", "amount": 0.25}, {"name": "large egg yolks", "units": "large", "amount": 4}, {"name": "granulated sugar", "units": "cup", "amount": 1}, {"name": "fresh lemon juice", "units": "cup", "amount": 0.33}, {"name": "lemon zest", "units": "tbsp", "amount": 2}, {"name": "cornstarch", "units": "tbsp", "amount": 2}]
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Line a 9×9" pan with parchment. Cut butter into flour, sugar, and salt until crumbly. Press ⅔ of the mix into the pan. Bake for 15 mins. 2. Whisk egg yolks, sugar, lemon juice, zest, and cornstarch in a saucepan. Cook on medium heat, stirring constantly, until thickened (5 mins). Pour over baked crust, then top with remaining crumble. 3. Bake 20-25 mins until golden. Cool completely (2+ hours) before slicing.
notes: Store in an airtight container for up to 1 week. Freeze for 3 months.
